```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r theme_wsj, cache = TRUE}
(qplot(hp, mpg, data=mtcars, geom="point")
+ scale_colour_wsj("colors6", "")
+ ggtitle("Diamond Prices")
+ theme_wsj())
## Use a gray background instead
(qplot(hp, mpg, data=mtcars, geom="point")
 + scale_colour_wsj("colors6", "")
 + ggtitle("Diamond Prices")
 + theme_wsj(color="gray"))



```
